ngiemboon: Á gʉa na mmó lɔg ńkẅéte mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ pie ée Yelúzálèm, mbà n gyǎ ngie á té ne ńzɛ́te ngie n gíŋe ne ńŋweʼe nò mǒ ŋweʼe wɔ́.
en: Now concerning the ministry to the saints, it is unnecessary for me to write to you.

ngiemboon: Á nue n ne ńzsé ngie pi gẅiin pòŋontʉ́m na yɔɔn nò, tá mbà n ka lɔgɔ nò gí ńkaʼte mvfò pʉ̀a Keleto pie ée Masenduwane. N ka shwoŋó wɔ́b ngie: «pʉ̀a Keleto pie ée na pàga ngwòŋ ye Akaye, é tyé lénáa mmó tà fó fʉ̀ʼ páʼɔɔn.» Agẅi lézeŋe nnɛ́ ńnáa mmó ka gÿo lelÿò pʉ̀a na pɔ́b gẅiin pòŋontʉ́m lénáa yɔ́b mmó.
en: For I know your eagerness, and I boast about you to the Macedonians,   “Achaia  # 9:2 Ac 18:12 has been ready since last year,” and your zeal  # 9:2 Nm 25:13 has stirred up most of them.  # 9:2 2Co 8:18; 12:18

ngiemboon: Táʼ, n túmo mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ páʼɔɔn, légwɔ́ gie legwɔ́ gẅie peg ka lɔgɔ nò gí ńkaʼte na yɔɔn nò, à te cʉa sẅɛ̀ɛ wɔ́. N ne ńtsɔ́ɔn ngie pi kwàʼ ńtyé léná páʼ n ka shwóŋ pʉ̀a,
en: But I am sending the brothers so that our boasting about you in this matter would not prove empty, and so that you would be ready just as I said.

ngiemboon: á nue peg lâ tsɔ́ pʉ̀a Masenduwane lɔɔn ḿbú ńtó, ńké te gyá pi tyé lénáa mmó wɔ́, mbà legwɔ́ gie peg ka laʼte mmó gie pi tyě légÿo, tà peg te mʉ́ʼte, ge sele gÿo eshʉ́ kúu wég, egẅí piŋ ńcʉa wég.
en: Otherwise, if any Macedonians come with me and find you unprepared, we, not to mention you, would be put to shame in that situation.

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á ka gÿo n gyá ngie á ne ńzɛ́te ngie mèŋ sẅíŋte mefɛ̌ mefɛ̌ pɔɔn, pɔ́ vɔgɔ mbʉ̀a pi tá peg táa ńtó, ḿvɔgɔ púʼu, lécúʼte gí mmó gie pi ka lǎʼ ńkaʼa lélɔg ntʉ́m mbòŋo ńná, ńzsé ngie n ge gwaa tó, à gwɔ́ tàʼa jʉʼ. Mè gyá ngie áa kwàʼ mmó pòŋontʉ́m, tà á té mmó gie mé sẅɛ́ɛ gẅí sẅɛ̌ tá pi náa wɔ́.
en: Therefore I considered it necessary to urge the brothers to go on ahead to you and arrange in advance the generous gift   you promised, so that it will be ready as a gift and not as an extortion.  # 9:5 Eph 5:3

ngiemboon: Pi zsé ngie nyìŋ lɔɔn ḿbye mmó á té gyɔ́ɔn, mbà á ge láʼa fʉ̀ʼʉ lélag shúm, à lag é le gyɔ́ɔn, ḿbye á gyɔ́ɔn, mbà á ge láʼa fʉ̀ʼʉ lélag shúm, à lag é gyɔ́ɔn.
en: The point is this:   The person who sows sparingly will also reap sparingly, and the person who sows generously will also reap generously.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, á poŋ ngie wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ náa mmó pɔ́ páʼ à ně ńkwaŋte tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m yé, ńná té ne ńgyáŋa lóŋ, té gwɔ́ gie mé sẅɛ́ɛ yé sẅɛ̌, á nue Ssé kwoŋo nyìŋ gẅie à lɔgɔ lekág ńnáa mmó.
en: Each person should do as he has decided in his heart #— #not reluctantly or out of compulsion, since God loves   a cheerful giver.

ngiemboon: E Ssé piŋ ńkuʼ páʼ ngwɔ́ á ná shúm mbòŋo mentí mentí né pi, légwɔ́ gie pi ge gwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼ ntsèm é gẅiin shúm sie é ne ńzɛ́te mbwó pi, tà gíŋ gẅiin mbɔɔ sie ngwɔ́ pi lɔg faʼ mefàʼ mbòŋo nzsè nzsè.
en: And God is able   to make every grace overflow to you, so that in every way, always having everything you need, you may excel in every good work.

ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ páʼ mé la ŋweʼe tsɛ̀ɛ Ŋwàʼne Ssé ngie:
E Ssé gẅie à náa mbyè mmó mbwó nyìŋ gẅie à pye, ńnáa mmó léjÿó á pfɛ́ɛ, à ge gÿo ké ne kẅiʼi shúm sí kẅiʼi, é gÿo e shʉ́a, légwɔ́ gie pi ge lɔgɔ pòŋontʉ́m é kẅiʼi náa mmó né pʉ̀a.
en: Now the one who provides seed for the sower and bread for food will also provide and multiply your seed and increase the harvest of your righteousness.

ngiemboon: Á ge cʉa púʼu, pi gẅiin shúm lélɔg faʼ mefàʼ pòŋontʉ́m ntí ntí, à cʉa púʼu, epʉ̀a tà ńgyɔ́ɔn ná ndǎg mbwó Ssé tɛʼ, á na nò shúm sie pi nǎ peg gaba mbwó pɔ́b.
en: You will be enriched   in every way for all generosity, which produces thanksgiving to God through us.

ngiemboon: Pi zɔɔn ńzsé ngie yɔɔn ncùb gie pi maʼa, e te gÿo epʉ̀a Keleto pie ée Yelúzálèm gẅiin pɔ́ mmó gie à zága mbwó pɔ́b ndàʼ wɔ́, e ge gíŋ kẅiŋte pʉ̀a, pɔ́ kẅiʼi ńná ndǎg mbwó Ssé tɛʼ.
en: For the ministry of this service   is not only supplying the needs of the saints but is also overflowing in many expressions of thanks to God.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ ge zsé nzẅìŋ yɔɔn fàʼ, é guʼte Ssé na páʼ pi ne ńtÿɔ́gɔ kwò na nò gie nkʉ̀ mbòŋo Keleto ne ńgɔɔn. Pɔ́ ge gíŋ guʼte Ssé na páʼ pi lɔgɔ́ pòŋontʉ́m, ńnáa mmó né pɔ́b tà mbɔɔ né petsɔ́ pʉ̀a.
en: Because of the proof provided by this ministry, they will glorify God for your obedient confession of the gospel of Christ, and for your generosity   in sharing with them and with everyone.

ngiemboon: Anò gí ge kúu ntʉ́m pɔ́b, pɔ́ néŋe ńne sẅíŋte Ssé na twó sí, á nue pɔ́ gyá ngie à cÿó gʉm gí, pi gẅiin ntʉ́m mbòŋo tɛʼ, tà ne ńkẅéte pʉ̀a páʼɔɔn.
en: And as they pray on your behalf, they will have deep affection for you because of the surpassing grace of God in you.

ngiemboon: Púʼu la, á poŋ ngie pege ná ndǎg mbwó Ssé, ńtí fùʼu té fʉ̀ʼ gie à la ná né pege.
en: Thanks be to God for his indescribable gift!
